data.meanings: to cut/sever/disunite/separate/detach, to disable in prosecuting, unable to proceed in, withdrew, break down, perish/cease/finish/fail, cut short / stop, intercepted/interrupted, put an end/stop to, a piece/bit/part/portion cut off from a whole, herd, distinct portion.
data.sentence: The word لَقَطَعْنَا comes from the root ق ط ع and is associated with the meanings: to cut/sever/disunite/separate/detach, to disable in prosecuting, unable to proceed in, withdrew, break down, perish/cease/finish/fail, cut short / stop, intercepted/interrupted, put an end/stop to, a piece/bit/part/portion cut off from a whole, herd, distinct portion.

data.meanings: to injure in the aorta, which rises from the upper part of the heart through which blood is carried from the left side of the heart, flow continuously.
data.sentence: The word الْوَتِينَ comes from the root و ت ن and is associated with the meanings: to injure in the aorta, which rises from the upper part of the heart through which blood is carried from the left side of the heart, flow continuously.
